title: Smithfield to Buy 110-Year-Old Hot Dog Maker Nathan’s Famous
description: Smithfield Foods Inc. said it would acquire legendary hot dog brand Nathan’s Famous in a deal valued at about $450 million, securing the rights to a key product in its business’s largest segment.
content: Smithfield Foods Inc. said it would acquire legendary hot dog brand Nathan’s Famous in a deal valued at about $450 million, securing the rights to a key product in its business’s largest segment.
